name: Rainy Day (Red RocketG)
description:
Welcome to my page! My name is Red Rocket, I've played many visual novels in the past, and I really like this genre of games. So I decided to try myself in creating a visual novel for adults. Right now I'm working on a game called "Rainy Day."

Rainy Day is a game whose main character is a famous lawyer named Markus Green. He always gets what he wants. But soon something happens that will change his life forever. He gets an offer that he can't refuse...

My Patreon page: https://www.patreon.com/RedRocketG
